author: jerenkrantz
msg: ra_serf: Support adding files in a commit.
(file_context_t): Make the PUT URL be explicit.
(setup_put): Use the explicit PUT URL rather than assuming it's been
(setup_head, accept_head, handle_head): New helper to implement HEAD reqs.
(close_file): If we did a checkout, we expect to see a 204 after the PUT; if
we didn't, we expect to see a 201 after the PUT.

author: blair
msg: Add a __len__ method to svnmerge.py's RevisionSet class so you can
easily find the number of revisions in the set by using len() on an
New method that returns the number of revisions in the set.
New test method to test the new RevisionSet.__len__ method.

author: blair
msg: Svnmerge.py's RevisionList class is actually much more a set than a
list, so rename it to RevisionSet.
s/rl/rs/ and s/list/set/ in many places.

author: blair
msg: In svnmerge.py's test suite, relocate the test working copies from
using the template repository to the test repository so the template
repository is not affected by commits.
Run 'svn switch --relocate' on the newly copied test working

author: blair
msg: Fix svnmerge.py's test suite command dictionary replacement.
Have TEST_* point to the test repository and working copies, not
